snippet: The fight took place at an anti-Putin rally on May 6. It was the first adjudication of 18 similar cases that have sent a shudder through Moscow’s middle-class political activists.
abstract: First of 19 defendants being prosecuted for taking part in May 2012 protest against Russian leader Vladimir V Putin in Moscow is sentenced to four and a half years in prison colony for fighting with police.

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and ANDREW ROTH

lead_paragraph: The fight took place at an anti-Putin rally on May 6. It was the first adjudication of 18 similar cases that have sent a shudder through Moscow’s middle-class political activists.

headline.seo: Russian Man Gets 4 1/ 2 Years in Prison for Fighting With Riot Policemen
headline.main: Russian Man Gets 4 1/2 Years in Prison for Fighting With Riot Policemen
